      public static Interval validateOnInterval(Interval po, boolean singlepg)
      Validate a page-on interval.
      Parameters:
      po - Page-on interval.
      singlepg - True for single page messages.
      Returns:
      Validated interval.

    • validateValue

      public static Interval validateValue(Interval val, boolean singlepg, Interval min, Interval max)
      Return a validated spinner value. A value of zero is valid for single page messages only.

    • pageOnIntervals

      public static Interval[] pageOnIntervals(String ms)
      Get the page-on intervals for the specified MULTI string.
      Parameters:
      ms - MULTI string.
      Returns:
      Array of page-on intervals (for each page).
